name: That's why you always lose your keys
name_original: That's why you always lose your keys
description:
Description

The main goal of this game is to piss off St. Peter by playing the role of its Heaven key ring.
Hide the keys in the best fitting hideouts to get in the way of St. Peter's jobs of the week. If he goes mad you win the game.
Otherwise, if St. Peter manages not to go crazy by the end of the week you fail your mission.

A tricky strategic game that will make you laugh a lot.

Rules

Read key's description and use it to choose the right place to hide them. Keep always an eye on Peter's schedule to take better chances to destroy his plans to drive him crazy before the end of the week.

Software
  • Piskel
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Atom Editor (JavaScript)
  • Open Office
  • Slack
Credits

Developer - Federico Manzella
Story and Level Design - Umberto Placucci
Art - Zeno Bianchini
Music - Niccolo' Missiroli
